title: Polly and the Black Ink - Book I: A New Start
description: When Polly moves from the city to live with her Aunt Sarah on a quiet and peaceful island (that shows on no map), something else follows. Something far more dangerous than anything Polly has had to face until now. To fight it, Polly must solve the mystery behind it and go on adventures in places beyond her imagination.
author: Vanessa Bettencourt
